dt: {bc}one that {a_link|works} especially at manual or industrial labor or with a particular material
{bc}any of the sexually underdeveloped and usually sterile members of a colony of social ants, bees, wasps, or termites that perform most of the labor and protective duties of the colony

shortdef: one that works especially at manual or industrial labor or with a particular material —often used in combination
a member of the working class
any of the sexually underdeveloped and usually sterile members of a colony of social ants, bees, wasps, or termites that perform most of the labor and protective duties of the colony

dt: {bc}a French Roman Catholic priest who for missionary purposes spends part of each weekday as a worker in a secular job

shortdef: a French Roman Catholic priest who for missionary purposes spends part of each weekday as a worker in a secular job

dt: {bc}a person who works temporary jobs typically in the service sector as an independent contractor or freelancer {bc}a worker in the {d_link|gig economy|gig economy}

dt.t: {wi}Gig workers{/wi} have freedoms that most full-timers only dream of: setting their own hours, working from home, being their own bosses. No wonder the gig economy comprised 16 percent of all workers by 2015, according to research by economists Lawrence Katz and Alan Krueger.
In addition to having more stable space, the affluent often have greater latitude to remain inside it. They can work on Zoom, shop on Amazon and have {wi}gig workers{/wi} deliver meals.

shortdef: a person who works temporary jobs typically in the service sector as an independent contractor or freelancer : a worker in the gig economy

dt: {bc}a foreign laborer working temporarily in an industrialized usually European country

shortdef: a foreign laborer working temporarily in an industrialized usually European country

dt: {bc}a person whose work involves sexually explicit behavior

shortdef: a person whose work involves sexually explicit behavior; especially : prostitute

dt: {bc}a person whose job is to give care to people who are ill, disabled, etc.

shortdef: a person whose job is to give care to people who are ill, disabled, etc.

dt: {bc}a person who works during the day

shortdef: a person who works during the day

dt: {bc}a person who does work without getting paid to do it {bc}a volunteer

shortdef: a person who does work without getting paid to do it : a volunteer

dt.t: went out for drinks with her {wi}coworkers{/wi} after work
So instead of serving your family, friends and even {wi}co-workers{/wi} outdated, calorie-laden foods, treat them to this new cuisine.

shortdef: one who works with another : a fellow worker
